product_overview: A premium institutional website for Dra. Jaqueline Ronchi Soares that highlights services, results and credentials while enabling patients to request appointments via a contact form or WhatsApp. The site focuses on a mobile-first, elegant presentation with smooth animations and easy booking flows.
core_goals: Establish a sophisticated online presence that reflects the clinic's premium brand
Make appointment requests easy via a contact form integrated with Formspree and direct WhatsApp booking
Showcase services, before/after results and testimonials to build trust and drive conversions
Deliver a responsive, performant experience with smooth animations and fast load times

features.name: Navigation (Navbar)
features.description: Sticky, responsive anchor navigation allowing users to jump to page sections (Início, Especialista, Serviços, Galeria, Depoimentos, Contato).
user_flows: Navigate to / -> Click navbar anchor (Serviços) -> Page scrolls to Services section -> See Services section header
Navigate to / -> Click navbar anchor (Contato) -> Page attempts to scroll to Contact section -> If anchor target not found see page remain at top and show visual indication of error

features.name: Hero Section & CTA
features.description: Prominent hero with an impact title, background animation and CTA to schedule an evaluation via WhatsApp with a prefilled message.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> See hero title and animated background -> Click WhatsApp button in Hero -> Browser opens WhatsApp chat with prefilled message -> See WhatsApp chat ready to send
Navigate to / -> See hero title -> Click WhatsApp button in Hero -> If WhatsApp not available or blocked see fallback modal with clinic phone number and copy-to-clipboard option

features.name: Especialista (Specialist Profile)
features.description: Profile section for Dra. Jaqueline Ronchi Soares showing credentials, specialties and professional photo.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> Scroll to Especialista section -> See name, CRO number and list of qualifications -> Click photo -> Photo enlarges in modal
Navigate to / -> Scroll to Especialista section -> See missing photo placeholder if image fails to load -> Click placeholder -> See tooltip indicating image unavailable

features.name: Services (Interactive Services)
features.description: Listing of main treatments with interactive cards, hover animations and concise descriptions to educate users and invite bookings.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> Scroll through services -> Hover over service card -> See hover animation and additional details reveal -> Click service card to open details or CTA
Navigate to / -> Scroll through services -> Hover over service card -> If animation fails see static card state -> Click service card -> See details or CTA without animation

features.name: Gallery & Results
features.description: Visual gallery with carousel and a before/after comparison slider to demonstrate treatment outcomes.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> Scroll to Galeria section -> See image carousel -> Click next arrow -> Carousel advances to next image -> See updated image
Navigate to / -> Scroll to Galeria section -> See comparison slider -> Drag slider handle -> Before/after images update accordingly
Navigate to / -> Scroll to Galeria section -> If images fail to load see placeholders -> Click carousel controls -> Controls are disabled and show error state

features.name: Testimonials (Depoimentos)
features.description: Section presenting patient feedback and star ratings to provide social proof.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> Scroll to Depoimentos section -> See list of testimonials with star ratings -> Click testimonial to expand full text
Navigate to / -> Scroll to Depoimentos section -> If no testimonials are available see empty state message prompting to check back later

features.name: Contact Form & Location
features.description: Contact section with a Formspree-integrated appointment form, clinic contact details, Google Maps iframe and a 'Como Chegar' directions button.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> Scroll to Contact section -> Fill in name field -> Fill in phone field -> Select service -> Fill in message -> Click Enviar button -> Form submits to https://formspree.io/f/xkovjlqr -> See success confirmation message

Navigate to / -> Scroll to Contact section -> Leave required field empty -> Click Enviar button -> See validation error for missing field -> Fill missing field -> Click Enviar button -> Form submits to https://formspree.io/f/xkovjlqr -> See success confirmation message
Navigate to / -> Scroll to Contact section -> See embedded Google Maps iframe -> Click Como Chegar button -> Google Maps opens with route to R. Manoel Thiago de Castro, 332
Navigate to / -> Scroll to Contact section -> Click Como Chegar button -> If maps blocked or iframe unavailable see address text and a link to open Google Maps in a new tab

features.name: WhatsApp Redirection (Direct Booking)
features.description: Buttons in Hero and Contact sections that open a WhatsApp chat to start an appointment conversation directly.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> Click WhatsApp button in Hero -> Browser opens WhatsApp chat with clinic number and prefilled message -> User can send appointment request

Navigate to / -> Scroll to Contact section -> Click Agendar por WhatsApp button in Contact section -> Browser opens WhatsApp chat -> If WhatsApp deep link fails show fallback modal with phone number and copy option

routes.description: Main landing page for Ronchi Odontologia

features.name: Contact Form
features.description: Users can send appointment requests via a form.
user_interactions: Fill in name, phone, service, and message

features.name: WhatsApp Redirection
features.description: Users can click WhatsApp buttons to open a direct chat.
user_interactions: Click Agendar por WhatsApp button in Contact section

features.name: Interactive Services
features.description: Browsing services with hover effects and animations.
user_interactions: Hover over service cards to see animations
